title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8115.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8115.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 74. Route
74 between exit 28 of IR 87 and Route 22 in the Towns of Schroon and

Ticonderoga and the Village of Ticonderoga. (b) Route 3. Route 3 between the northerly

Essex/Franklin county line and the westerly Essex/Franklin county line, in the

Town of St. Armand and Village of Saranac Lake. (c) Route 86. Route 86 between the

Essex/Franklin county line and Route 73 in the Village of Saranac Lake, Town of

North Elba and Village of Lake Placid. (d) Route 73. Route 73 between Route 86 and
US Route 9 in the Village of Lake Placid and Towns of North Elba, Keene and

Elizabethtown. (e) US Route 9. US
Route 9 between Route 73 and IR 87, exit 30, in the Towns of Elizabethtown and

North Hudson. (f) Route 22. Route
22 between IR 87 (exit 33) and the southern limit of the Hamlet of

Willsboro. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8115.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
